  • Von de.happybavarian07.coolstufflib.languagemanager verwendete Klassen in de.happybavarian07.coolstufflib.languagemanager.expressionengine
    Klasse
    Beschreibung
    ExpressionEngine
    A modern implementation of the conditional expression parser using a lexer/parser/interpreter pattern.
    ExpressionEnginePool
    ExpressionEnginePool manages the lifecycle and retrieval of ExpressionEngine instances for different language contexts and player-language associations.
  • Von de.happybavarian07.coolstufflib.languagemanager.expressionengine verwendete Klassen in de.happybavarian07.coolstufflib.languagemanager.expressionengine
    Klasse
    Beschreibung
    ConditionBuilder
    A fluent builder class for constructing complex conditional expressions used in the language manager's expression engine.
    ExpressionEngine
    A modern implementation of the conditional expression parser using a lexer/parser/interpreter pattern.
    Interpreter
    The interpreter evaluates parsed expressions and computes their values.
    LanguageFunctionManager
    Manages function registration and execution for the expression parser system.
    Lexer
    Converts source text into a sequence of tokens for parsing.
    Parser
    A recursive descent parser that processes tokens into an abstract syntax tree (Expression objects) for the language manager's expression engine.
    Parser.Expression
    Abstract base class for all expression nodes in the abstract syntax tree.
    Parser.Expression.Assignment
    Represents a variable assignment expression that creates a temporary variable with a specified lifetime.
    Parser.Expression.Binary
    Represents a binary operation expression with a left operand, operator, and right operand.
    Parser.Expression.Call
    Represents a function call expression with a function name and zero or more arguments.
    Parser.Expression.ConditionalBranch
    Represents a single branch within a conditional chain, containing a condition and the expression to evaluate if that condition is true.
    Parser.Expression.ConditionalChain
    Represents a complete conditional chain with multiple if/elif branches and an optional else clause.
    Parser.Expression.Grouping
    Represents a grouped expression enclosed in parentheses that controls evaluation order.
    Parser.Expression.Literal
    Represents a literal value expression that contains a constant value such as numbers, strings, booleans, or null.
    Parser.Expression.Logical
    Represents a logical expression that combines two expressions with a logical operator.
    Parser.Expression.Sequence
    Represents a sequence of expressions that are evaluated in order, with the final expression's value being the result of the sequence.
    Parser.Expression.Ternary
    Represents a ternary conditional expression (condition ?
    Parser.Expression.Unary
    Represents a unary operation expression that applies an operator to a single operand.
    Parser.Expression.Variable
    Represents a variable reference expression that looks up a value by name in the current execution context.
    Parser.Expression.Visitor

    TokenType
